Raphael.translation[0].definitions[0].de: in the Christian religion, an archangel (=a spirit of the highest rank who lives with God in Heaven)
Raphael.translation[1].definitions[0].de: (1483â€“1520) an Italian painter and architect (=someone who designs buildings), one of the most important artists of the Renaissance, who painted mostly religious subjects. His full name in Italian is Raffaello Sanzio.
